Key Match Events: The White Sox blew leads in the 8th, 10th, and 11th innings before losing the game in the 13th on a walk-off RBI single by Jordyn Adams.
Post-Match Reflections: Grady Sizemore commented on the missed opportunities and the bullpen's struggles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox fell to 36-117, three losses away from tying the modern Major League record of 120 losses in a season set by the 1962 New York Mets.
Others: The game was a scheduled bullpen game with Jared Shuster, Gus Varland, and Prelander Berroa combining for seven scoreless innings to start the game.
